## About

Interactive dashboard to visualize reliability-based calibration results. Because we have more 
results than it could be put on a few plots.

**Best viewed on larger screens (not on mobile phones).**

Related links: 
* <a href="https://github.com/TNO/shear_calibration_shiny" target="_blank">source code of this dashboard</a>.
* <a href="https://github.com/TNO/shear_calibration" target="_blank">calibration code (to generate the results to be visualized)</a>.
